QuestData.Title: Keep Thornfang Hill Clear!
QuestData.Description: We've been fighting an ongoing battle to keep the pass through Thornfang Hill to the west clear of ravagers. It would be bad if we were to become completely cut off from the refuge in Zangarmarsh.$B$BWe don't want to displace the creatures, but there seems to be little choice as their attacks on travelers through the area have become more aggressive.$B$BClear some of the ravagers out of there if you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Thornfang Ravagers and 8 Thornfang Venomspitters, and then return to Mahuram Stouthoof at the Cenarion Post in Hellfire Peninsula.
QuestData.CompletionText: How fares your attempt to clear Thornfang Hill?
QuestData.RewardText: With the ravagers cleared, travelers to and from the Cenarion Refuge in Zangarmarsh should have an easier time of it.$B$BThe Cenarion Expedition is indebted to you.
